tool_description: The 3D Bin Packing Problem (3D-BPP) is one of the most frequent problems in warehousing and logistics. Its solution involves filling a container (a box or pallet) with items as closely to each other as possible to minimize the number of required containers.

api_list.name: go
api_list.description: This API implementation is used to solve 3D container packing problems for shipping carton calculation.
